ossj.qos.ri.pm.threshold.adapter
Interface ThresholdMonitorStatus

public interface ThresholdMonitorStatus

Different status for threshold monitors. Only the THRESHOLD_CLEARED and the THRESHOLD_CROSSED constants are used as status in the entity bean. The third constant THRESHOLD_NOT_CROSSED_OR_CLEARED is only used when a threshold is evaluated and is neither cleared or crossed.

Author:
Henrik Lindstrom, Ericsson

Field Summary
static int THRESHOLD_CLEARED
          Indicates that a threshold monitor is cleared, i.e.
static int THRESHOLD_CROSSED
          Indicates that a threshold monitor has crossed its threshold value.
static int THRESHOLD_NOT_CROSSED_OR_CLEARED
          Indicates the status when a threshold is neither crossed or cleared.
 

Field Detail

THRESHOLD_NOT_CROSSED_OR_CLEARED

public static final int THRESHOLD_NOT_CROSSED_OR_CLEARED
Indicates the status when a threshold is neither crossed or cleared.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

THRESHOLD_CLEARED

public static final int THRESHOLD_CLEARED
Indicates that a threshold monitor is cleared, i.e. its threshold value has not been reached. The threshold also reach this status after a crossed threshold is cleared again.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

THRESHOLD_CROSSED

public static final int THRESHOLD_CROSSED
Indicates that a threshold monitor has crossed its threshold value.

See Also:
